column3: Thanks for helping with translations! However, changes to translations as well as new translations are submitted to [Bitcoin Core's Transifex page](https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/).\n\nTranslations are periodically pulled from Transifex and merged into the git repository. See the [translation process](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/translation_process.md) for de

Thank you for the guidance, links and explanations.\n\nI didn't find the same file structure on transifex.com/bitcoin/bitcoin so I cannot perform the same fixes. But I translated other labels (for 0.18) to help.
